# Set Up 

```{r}
#| label: packages and data
#| message: false
#| warning: false
library(tidyverse) #general use package 
library(lterdatasampler) #package of data sets
library(NatParksPalettes) #color packets

data(pie_crab) #crab size dataset 
```

# Exploratory data visualizatoin 
```{r}

ggplot(data=pie_crab,
       aes(x = latitude, 
           y = size,
           color = site)
       ) +
  #points to represent individual crabs 
  geom_point() + 
  scale_color_manual(
    values = natparks.pals("Arches", n = 13, type = "continuous")
  )
```
